channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Sifo for Svenska Dagbladet, 22–27 August 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Sveriges socialdemokratiska arbetareparti (S&D): 24.3–27.6%
  • Moderata samlingspartiet (EPP): 16.9–19.8%
  • Sverigedemokraterna (ECR): 17.4–20.3%
  • Miljöpartiet de gröna (Greens/EFA): 4.7–6.5%
  • Centerpartiet (ALDE): 7.5–9.6%
  • Vänsterpartiet (GUE/NGL): 8.4–10.7%
  • Liberalerna (ALDE): 4.5–6.2%
  • Kristdemokraterna (EPP): 5.3–7.1%
